sections.heading: About Me
sections.body: I'm a University of Michigan student studying Computer Engineering. I aspire to do more with my degree than just earn a wage. With my degree I want to affect positive change in this world and work on projects that matter.

sections.heading: Site Methodology
sections.body: A resume is nice, but it very quickly drops off old projects and experiences. Its brief nature doesn't give nearly enough detail and history on projects——that I promise——are a lot cooler than a resume blurb will lead you to believe
